content.raw: The only thing I'd mention here is that people using segway (and reading the documents) may not be familiar with Python programming. I would be hesitant to mention python string formatting and simply state that it will be the segment and the subsegment seperated by a '.' and possibly give an example ( e.g "22.3" )
